Text:
Will you please seed the posts you made yesterday? 

And go read the comment I made on them?

Thank you.
Sorry, but the system does not allow me to modify the previous Torrents! :(

Understood, but you could repost the torrents which have been pulled as I noted, taking the time to group them into a single bigger torrent which will stand a better chance of surviving a little longer. 

How about it?
